entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Lloydminster
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -8.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lloydminster Airport 06:45 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -8.6°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 91 %

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
